seo.title: Reset Sprint – 3 sessions to pause and choose | SustainSage
seo.description: A short coaching sprint for when life is heavy but you still want a thoughtful partner to help you decide your next steps.

hero.title: Reset Sprint – 3 sessions
hero.subtitle: For when life is “a bit much”, but you don’t want a 6-month programme.
hero.imageAlt: Illustration of pausing and choosing next steps

fit.title: Is this for you?
items: You’re not in crisis, but your current way of working or living feels unsustainable.
You’re circling the same questions in your head and would like a neutral, trained sounding board.
You want clarity on 1–2 key decisions in the next 4–8 weeks.

journey.title: What we do (3 sessions)
journey.description: The sprint is paced but spacious. You set the focus; we help you listen to yourself and test options within your real-world constraints.
steps: Session 1 – Lay everything on the table.
Session 2 – Test options with honest constraints.
Session 3 – Commit to 1–3 realistic moves + how you’ll self-check.

outcomes.title: What you leave with
items: A one-page summary of what matters now, what you’re saying yes/no to.
1–3 small, doable experiments instead of 20 open tabs in your head.

boundaries.title: What this is not
items: Not crisis counselling or emergency support.
Not career coaching in a “fix your CV in 60 minutes” sense.

body.value: Use the intro call to see whether a short sprint is the right container. If another type of support fits better, we’ll say so.
